name: Impact-First Development
description: Start with most impactful components to maximize relationship coverage
principles: IDENTIFY HIGH-IMPACT FILES - Start with files that create the most relationships
BUILD TOP-DOWN BY GROUPS - Organize files into logical groups
ESTABLISH CORE CONNECTIONS FIRST - Build foundational types and interfaces early
MINIMIZE WORK THROUGH RELATIONSHIPS - Leverage existing code to reduce duplication
FOLLOW THE GRAPH - Always be aware of dependency relationships
CLEAN CODE OVER FAST CODE - Less code with full functionality is ideal
WAIT FOR GRAPH UPDATES - Ensure dependency graph is current before proceeding

approach.step_2: Identify all file groups and their relationships
approach.step_3: Rank groups by impact (most dependencies = highest impact)
approach.step_4: Create core types and interfaces first
approach.step_5: Build outward from core, group by group
approach.step_6: Update graph after each file creation

guidelines.file_ordering: Create files that others depend on first
guidelines.group_size: Keep groups small enough to fit in context
guidelines.dependency_direction: Dependencies should flow one direction (avoid cycles)
guidelines.graph_awareness: Always check graph before and after changes
